special_text:
Fable [i](You may trigger the chapters of this saga in any order. You choose which chapter to use as you place lore counters on it.)[/i]
I – Return up to one target creature to its owner's hand.
II – Return up to one target planeswalker to its owner's hand.
III – Exile Sorrow of Azgol. You may cast it from exile during your next turn.
